casebody.data:
First Department,

October, 1950.

(October 3, 1950.) In the Matter of Hazel Marcus, Appellant. R. H. Macy & Co., Inc., Respondent.

Order unanimously affirmed, with $20 costs and disbursements. Ho opinion. Present — Glennon, J. P., Dore, Cohn, Van Voorhis and Shientag, JJ. [See post, p. 1105.]
